import React, { useState } from 'react' import {projectsData} from '../data/projectsData' const Project = (props) => { const [currentProject] = useState(projectsData); const project = currentProject[props.projectNumber]; console.log(project); return (

{project.title}

    {project.languages.map((item)=>{ return
  • {item}
    • })}

) } export default Project
